===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=on|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR|acc2=3|acc2_ref=DJR|なんてん}}

===Etymology 1===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=なんてん}} {{m|ltc|南天|tr=*nom *ten|lit=southern heavens}}. Compare modern {{cog|zh|南天|tr=nántiān}}.

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|なんてん}}

# the [[southern]] [[skies]]

===Etymology 2===
Apparently ultimately an abbreviation of {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=なんてん}} {{m|ltc|南天竹|tr=*nom *ten *djiuk}} or {{m|ltc|南天竺|tr=*nom *ten *djiuk?}}, referring to a type of plant similar to [[bamboo]], originating from an area further to the south (India or Indochina).<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Compare modern {{cog|zh|南天竹|tr=nántiān zhú}}.

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|なんてん}}

# [[nandina]], [[heavenly bamboo]], {{vern|sacred bamboo}}: {{taxlink|Nandina domestica|species|noshow=1}}, a kind of [[flowering]] [[shrub]].
# a kind of {{m|ja|家紋|tr=kamon||family crest}} featuring the nandina in the design.

====Compounds====
* {{ja-r|南天紋|なんてん もん}}: a kind of family crest featuring the nandina in the design.

=====Usage notes=====
In biology contexts, this term is spelled in katakana as {{ja-l|ナンテン}}.
